oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Survey of Dairy Producer Attitudes and Practices Regarding Antibiotic Use and Residue Avoidance
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hutchinson, L. J.
Sears, P. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: quality assurance
survey
clients
dairy practitioners
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A random sampling of 809 dairy herds were surveyed by telephone to determine their attitudes, awareness, and practices regarding dairy quality assurance (QA). Some very predictable and some very surprising results will be discussed. Implications for dairy practitioners and their clients also will be discussed in this presentation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1993; 167-168
